underlying_goal: Extend existing agent-spec-builder and agent-implementation-builder skills to support DSPy framework patterns, creating a comprehensive spec and handover document for implementation
friction_detail: Claude initially proposed creating separate DSPy skills rather than extending the existing ones, and user had to clarify the spec should be in the Novosapien directory not the current directory.
brief_summary: User wanted to extend existing agent skill builders with DSPy framework support; Claude researched the codebase, created an implementation plan, wrote a comprehensive spec, and produced a handover message for a new agent to execute the work.
